short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It utilizes the chrome.topSites API to access and retrieve the list of sites most frequently visited by the user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the Top Sites right within a convenient Google Chrome extension called "Most Visited Sites"! Wave goodbye to a sea of bookmarks and crowded tabs. This nifty tool places your favorite websites within reach, accessible instantly through its popup window.

Highlighted Features:

Instant Accessibility: Effortlessly view and open frequently visited websites directly from the popup window.

Tailored Selection: Customize your list of top sites, curating it with the websites you use most frequently and aligning it with your preferences.

Streamlined Interface: Navigate through a sleek and well-organized interface, simplifying the search for your favorite sites.

Smart Organization: Sites are smartly arranged based on your usage patterns, ensuring speedy access to your most relevant and frequently visited sites.

Simplified Browsing: Bid farewell to cluttered bookmarks and overloaded tabs â€“ My Top Sites enhances your browsing by streamlining the experience.
